pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 20  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)22 on easy, 43 on normal, 64 on hard    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Overworld at light level 0    $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)$(thing)Creepers$() chase any $(thing)Player$() within a 16 block radius. They do not voluntarily attack any other mob. When within 3 blocks of a $(thing)Player$(), a $(thing)Creeper$() stops moving, hisses, flashes and expands and explodes after 1.5 seconds, destroying blocks in the area as well as significantly damaging the target. It can be charged with a lightning bolt.
$(n)Drops:$() 0-2 Gun Powders, 1 Music Disk if killed by a Skeleton or Stray, 1 Creeper Head if killed by a Charged Creeper $(br)$(n)XP:$() 5
